import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function AddExercise() { const[exercise, setExercise] = useState({ name:"", bodyPart:"", numberOfSets:"", numberOfReps:"", weight:"" }) const{name, bodyPart, numberOfSets, numberOfReps, weight}=exercise const onInputChange = (event) => { setExercise({...exercise,[event.target.name]:event.target.value}) } return (
